attributes.action: Return taken artefacts to their country of origin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take a great moral step by returning all previously taken artefacts to their country of origin. The first items that spring to mind are the Elgin Marbles followed by numerous Chinese items. I believe that such a gesture rights some wrongs. The "spoils of war" is no excuse in todays society.
